other_tests.changes_over_time: Lesions improved with immunosuppressive therapy but recurred upon tapering.

other_tests.findings: CSF protein level 54 mg/dL (reference range, 5 to 55), total nucleated-cell count 16 per cubic mm with 66% lymphocytes; negative infectious tests; no abnormal cell populations.
Opening pressure 45 cm of water (normal range, 10 to 25), normal CSF analysis.
Extensive bilateral optic-disk edema (grade 4 on the Frisén scale) with associated subretinal fluid and multiple hemorrhages.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Papilledema decreased to Frisén grade 3 at follow-up.
